title: Revenue total incorrect
description: Dashboard shows $1,200 but actual revenue is $12,000
steps: Open main dashboard and check revenue widget

title: Login button misaligned
description: Submit button is 5px off-center on mobile Safari

title: Wrong user data displayed
description: Profile page shows another user's email and phone number
steps: Log in as user A, navigate to profile

title: Search results slow
description: Search takes 10+ seconds on datasets > 1000 items

title: ML fraud model wrong label
description: Legitimate transaction classified as fraud with 0.95 confidence
steps: Submit transaction ID TXN-9982, check classification

title: Percentage calculation off
description: Discount shown as 50% but actual is 5% (missing decimal point)
steps: View product page with discount applied

title: Aggregation count duplicated
description: Monthly active users count includes same user multiple times

title: Timezone mismatch in report
description: Report shows events at wrong time, but timezone label is correct
